title: TUTORIAL Miniature wicker flower basket | PDF + video
description: In this step-by-step guide, you will learn how to create a miniature basket from floral wire and thread. You will discover how to prepare the materials, weave the basket, shape it, and secure the details with glue. Additionally, you will receive tips on painting the basket and decorating the handle. The photos show the basket with other items for demonstration purposes, but the tutorial only covers the making of the basket itself. This project is suitable for dollhouses in aâ€¦
